ex.parser
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  ex.parser.Parser
Direct Known Subclasses:
BestParser, LRParser
public abstract class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

Groups document's ACs into ICs.

public static void setInitialProbs(GState[] states,
                                   int start,
                                   int end)
sets sum to myScore for those states which do not have predecessors within this range (i.e. for all initial states in this range)

createACLattice

public int createACLattice(Trellis acTrellis,
                           ACSegmentCache acSegments)
Creates a token-based lattice containing all ACs found in document so far. The lattice allows for passing through each complete AC (AC's orphan prob is used) and also for avoiding it by going through the background states (the mistake prob of the most probable AC at that token is used).

precomputeACSegments

public int precomputeACSegments(Trellis acTrellis,
                                ACSegmentCache acSegments)

interrupt

public boolean interrupt(int req)

setMaxICs

public void setMaxICs(int max)

setMaxParseTime

public void setMaxParseTime(long max)

mergeACLatticeWithICSetII

public GState[] mergeACLatticeWithICSetII(java.util.Collection<ICBase> icSet,
                                          Document doc)
Creates a lattice of non-overlapping ICs from an IC set, merges it with ACSegments lattice. Returns a lattice of DynStates pointing to Extractables - ACs and ICs.

resolveReferences

public int resolveReferences(Document d)
For each AC ac, populates ac.refersTo sets with possible references found in the document. Returns the number of found reference groups (consisting of two or more referenced ACs).
